about.title: About Zira
about.description: Zira allows users to give or take roles away from themselves by simply reacting or unreacting to the setup message(s).

features.title: Features
features.description:
Multiple messages
Multiple channels
Able to use any role
Autorole on user or bot join (command setup only)
Able to use custom or regular emojis
Join messages (command setup only)

header.title: Managing
header.description: NOTE: You don't need to change every field each time.

help.before: To get a message ID follow

add.label: Add Role
add.notice:
Only custom emojis from the server.
If you want to use regular emojis please use the add command in your server.
